  * Unlimited **FREE** regular admission
  * Invitations to exhibition openings
  * 10% discount on tickets to special programs
  * 10% discount at Shaker Mercantile

Members at the Friend level and above receive reciprocal admission at more than a thousand museums in the United States, Canada and Mexico through the **[North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Association](https://hancockshakervillage.org/support/membership/north-american-reciprocal-museum-program/).**

## Accessibility Statement for Hancock Shaker Village

This is an accessibility statement from Hancock Shaker Village.

### Measures to support accessibility

Hancock Shaker Village takes the following measures to ensure accessibility of Hancock Shaker Village:

  * Include accessibility as part of our mission statement.
  * Include people with disabilities in our design personas

### Conformance status

The [Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG)](https://www.w3.org/WAI/standards-guidelines/wcag/) defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities. It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA. Hancock Shaker Village is partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA. Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the accessibility standard.

### Feedback

We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Hancock Shaker Village. Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers on Hancock Shaker Village:

  * Phone: (413) 443-0188
  * E-mail: [info@hancockshakervillage.org](mailto:info@hancockshakervillage.org)
  * Visitor Address: 1843 West Housatonic St., Pittsfield MA, 01201
  * Postal Address: PO Box 927, Pittsfield, MA 01202

We try to respond to feedback within 2 business days.
